message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product. I believe you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me is $1200000.

I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you is $1200000.
